Title:
Taxonomic study of Hypotrachyna subgenus Everniastrum
(Ascomycota, Parmeliaceae) from Hengduan Mountains, China
Keywords:
Lichenized fungi, New species, Phylogeny, Species
diversity
Abstract:
Revisional taxonomic study of Hypotrachyna subgenus
Everniastrum from Hengduan Mountains, China has been carried out in this
paper, after morphological, chemical and phylogenetic study, a total of
sixteen species are confirmed in this area, all the species previously
reported from China have been found in the Hengduan Mountains region,
four species new to science and one new record to China are recorded.
Detailed descriptions, figures for the new species and a key to all the
known species from China are provided.
